education_text.0: Steele was born in      Missouri and graduated from the      Boston Latin School Boston Latin School in 1972In addition to specifications of the language Java, Steele's work at Sun Microsystems has included research in parallel algorithms, implementation strategies, and architecture and software supportUnder the pseudonym Great Quux,          which was an old student nickname at the      Boston Latin School Boston Latin School and MIT, he has published light verse and   cartoonsUnder the pseudonym Great Quux,          which was an old student nickname at the      Boston Latin School Boston Latin School and MIT, he has published light verse and   cartoons
